name: Beast Pets

minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 Storage: 400 MB available space
